name: Emily Carr
description: Emily Carr, a Canadian artist, is celebrated for her stunning depictions of the Pacific Northwest forests.

name: Albert Bierstadt
description: Albert Bierstadt was an American painter known for his grandiose landscapes, including magnificent scenes of the American West.

name: Claude Monet
description: Claude Monet, the French Impressionist master, captured the enchanting beauty of forests in his iconic paintings.
